title: How to Get Hitmontop on Pokémon FireRed

steps.title: Go to Saffron city.
steps.content: Go to Saffron city. Use Fly to get there quicker and enter the gym like building to the right of the gym.

steps.title: Either choose Hitmonchan or Hitmonlee.
steps.content: Either choose Hitmonchan or Hitmonlee. Your choice doesn't really effect anything besides owning a new Pokémon.

steps.title: Obtain a Ditto.
steps.content: Obtain a Ditto. Can be found in the mansion in Cinnabar Island.

steps.title: Fly to Island Four, and drop off Hitmonchan/Hitmonlee and the Ditto to the Day Care.
steps.content: Fly to Island Four, and drop off Hitmonchan/Hitmonlee and the Ditto to the Day Care.

steps.title: Wait for them to make some magic and be alert when you get your Tyrogue egg.
steps.content: Wait for them to make some magic and be alert when you get your Tyrogue egg.

steps.title: Walk around with the egg until it hatches to Tyrogue.
steps.content: Walk around with the egg until it hatches to Tyrogue.

steps.title: Start leveling up Tyrogue carefully.
steps.content: Start leveling up Tyrogue carefully. In order to make it evolve into Hitmontop, Tyrogue needs to have the same attack and defense stats. Nothing above or below, just the same stats. Which is extremely difficult.

steps.title: If your Tyrogue has the same Attack and Defense stats and you raise it to level 20, it will successfully evolve into Hitmontop.
steps.content: If your Tyrogue has the same Attack and Defense stats and you raise it to level 20, it will successfully evolve into Hitmontop.
